scripts.cy:run-reports: npm run clean:reports && npx cypress run --record false --browser chrome && npm run generate:mochawesome-report
scripts.generate:mochawesome-report: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > cypress/results/mochawesome/combined-report.json && npx marge cypress/results/mochawesome/combined-report.json -o cypress/results/mochawesome
scripts.copy:report: npm run clean:docs && mkdir -p docs && cp cypress/results/mochawesome/combined-report.html docs/index.html
